welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Waltham Cross, a charming town known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used exclusively for private flights and offers a more personalized and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles both domestic and international flights. It is equipped with modern facilities and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for overflow flights and charter flights. It is connected to the main terminal by a shuttle bus.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'STN Airport WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used by budget airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to exclusive and VIP flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wethersfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
